title: The Treasure of the Sierra Madre
description: Two Americans searching for work in Mexico convince an old prospector to help them mine for gold in the Sierra Madre Mountains.

title: The Red Shoes
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture
description: A young ballet dancer is torn between the man she loves and her pursuit to become a prima ballerina.

title: Hamlet
description: Prince Hamlet struggles over whether or not he should kill his uncle, whom he suspects has murdered his father, the former King.

title: Bicycle Thieves
description: In post-war Italy, a working-class man's bicycle is stolen, endangering his efforts to find work. He and his son set out to find it.

title: Red River
description: A rebellious young man and his tyrannical foster father fall out during a cattle drive from Texas to Missouri.

title: Rope
description: Two men try to convince themselves they've committed the perfect murder by hosting a dinner party after strangling a former classmate to death.

title: Key Largo
description: A man visits his old friend's hotel and finds a gangster running things. As a hurricane approaches, the two end up confronting each other.

title: Johnny Belinda
description: A kind doctor volunteers to tutor a deaf-mute woman, but scandal starts to swirl when his pupil is raped and falls pregnant.

title: The Snake Pit
description: A detailed chronicle that tells the story of a woman who finds herself in an insane asylum and cannot remember how she got there.

title: The Naked City
description: Police investigate the murder of a young woman in New York City.

title: Fort Apache
description: At Fort Apache, an honorable and veteran war captain finds conflict when his regime is placed under the command of a young, glory hungry lieutenant colonel with no respect for the local Indian tribe.

title: The Search
description: An American soldier in post-war Germany helps a lost Czech boy find his mother.

title: Joan of Arc
description: The story of the 15th-century French peasant girl who led the French army against the British.

title: Easter Parade
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Musical Picture
description: A nightclub performer hires a naive chorus girl to become his new partner to make his former partner jealous and prove he can make a star out of anyone.

title: The Fallen Idol
description: A diplomat's son creates a web of lies to protect the butler he idolizes, who is suspected of murdering his wife.

title: The Paleface
description: Calamity Jane is sent to find out who is smuggling rifles to the Indians and winds up married to a hapless dentist as part of her cover.

title: A Foreign Affair
description: A congressional committee visits occupied Berlin to investigate G.I. morale, where a strait-laced congresswoman gets involved in a love triangle.

title: Letter from an Unknown Woman
description: A pianist receives a letter from a woman he has known his whole life but never truly noticed.

title: Sitting Pretty
description: A mysterious man is hired as a babysitter by a struggling couple, but he has a secret agenda.

title: Sorry, Wrong Number
description: A bedridden woman accidentally overhears a murder plot on the telephone, but cannot get anyone to believe her.

title: I Remember Mama
description: A Norwegian immigrant family in San Francisco in the 1910s is held together by their wise and loving mother.

title: Mr. Blandings Builds His Dream House
description: A Manhattan family moves to the country and buys a dilapidated farmhouse, leading to a series of comedic renovation disasters.

title: Abbott and Costello Meet Frankenstein
description: Two freight handlers encounter Dracula, the Frankenstein Monster, and the Wolf Man.

title: The Three Musketeers
description: D'Artagnan and his Musketeer friends Athos, Porthos, and Aramis fight to protect the King of France and his Queen from the machinations of Cardinal Richelieu.

title: 3 Godfathers
description: Three outlaws on the run discover a dying woman and her baby. They swear to save the child and risk their freedom to do so.

title: State of the Union
description: An aircraft tycoon is urged to run for President, but he finds that he has to compromise his principles and his marriage.

title: Force of Evil
description: An unethical lawyer tries to protect his older brother from a gangster who is taking over the numbers racket.

title: They Live by Night
description: An escaped convict and a young woman fall in love and try to live a normal life while on the run from the law.

title: Unfaithfully Yours
description: A famous conductor suspects his wife of infidelity and fantasizes about three different ways to handle the situation during a concert.

title: Oliver Twist
description: An orphan boy in London is taken in by a gang of thieves led by the treacherous Fagin.

title: The Big Clock
description: A magazine editor is framed for a murder committed by his powerful boss and must solve the crime himself while avoiding capture.

title: The Pirate
description: A girl is engaged to the local rich man, but meanwhile she has dreams about the legendary pirate Macoco. A traveling singer falls in love with her and to impress her he poses as the pirate.

title: Yellow Sky
description: A gang of bank robbers hides out in a ghost town where they encounter an old prospector and his tomboy granddaughter.

title: Macbeth
description: A Scottish lord becomes convinced by a trio of witches that he will become the next King of Scotland, and his ambitious wife supports him in his plans of seizing power.

title: Portrait of Jennie
description: A struggling artist meets a mysterious young girl in Central Park who seems to age rapidly every time they meet.

title: He Walked by Night
description: A brilliant but psychopathic criminal evades the police in Los Angeles, using the storm drain system as his hideout.

title: Raw Deal
description: An escaped convict tries to flee the country with his girlfriend and a hostage, while being pursued by the mob.

title: Moonrise
description: A man haunted by his father's criminal past accidentally kills a bully in a fight and tries to hide his crime.

title: Call Northside 777
description: A reporter investigates a decade-old murder case to prove the innocence of a convicted man.

title: Cry of the City
description: A cop chases a criminal he grew up with through the streets of New York City.

title: The Boy with Green Hair
description: A war orphan wakes up one morning with green hair and becomes an outcast in his small town.

title: Pitfall
description: A bored insurance agent has an affair with a client's girlfriend, leading to a web of blackmail and murder.

title: Germany Year Zero
description: A young boy in post-war Berlin tries to support his family in the ruins of the city.

title: Drunken Angel
description: An alcoholic doctor forms an unlikely friendship with a young yakuza gangster who has tuberculosis.

title: Spring in a Small Town
description: A lonely wife in a small town finds her feelings reawakened when her husband's friend comes to visit.

title: The Winslow Boy
description: A father fights to clear his son's name after he is expelled from naval college for stealing a postal order.

title: Command Decision
description: A general faces political pressure and personal turmoil while commanding a bomber squadron in World War II.

title: Apartment for Peggy
description: A retired professor takes in a young couple, a pregnant wife and a GI student husband, and finds new meaning in life.

title: Arch of Triumph
description: A refugee doctor in Paris before WWII falls in love with a woman while trying to evade deportation.

title: Romance on the High Seas
description: A woman sends a singer on a cruise in her place to spy on her husband, but complications ensue when the husband hires a detective to spy on her.

title: Words and Music
description: A biography of the songwriting partnership of Richard Rodgers and Lorenz Hart.

title: The Time of Your Life
description: A wealthy man whiles away his days in a San Francisco bar, observing and helping the various characters who come in.
